title: Bug 18934 - Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.2, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. This is observed when opening a small image such as an icon, where the scrollbars are misleading because they do not perform any action.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled and not movable when opening a small image. This will prevent confusion and misdirection.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Open a small image, like an icon.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but do not affect the view of the image.
